pages.purpose: Detailed explanation of how API requests are parsed, routed, and handled

pages.purpose: Docker-compatible request/response structures and JSON serialization patterns

pages.purpose: The custom container runtime built directly on Linux kernel primitives

pages.purpose: How container processes are created, configured, and managed through their lifecycle

pages.title: Namespace Isolation
pages.purpose: Linux namespace management for process, network, filesystem, and other isolation

pages.title: Filesystem Isolation
pages.purpose: Mount management, rootfs setup, pivot_root, and filesystem isolation techniques

pages.title: Resource Control (Cgroups)
pages.purpose: Cgroup v1 and v2 management for CPU, memory, PID, and I/O resource limits

pages.purpose: Low-level Linux system call bindings for container operations

pages.title: Container Management
pages.purpose: Higher-level container lifecycle management and orchestration

pages.title: Container Lifecycle
pages.purpose: Container states, transitions, and lifecycle operations (start, stop, pause, remove)

pages.title: Container Configuration
pages.purpose: ContainerConfig structure, port mappings, volume mounts, and resource limits

pages.title: Image System
pages.purpose: Image building, storage, and distribution

pages.title: Image Building
pages.purpose: How Runefiles and Dockerfiles are parsed and built into OCI-compliant images

pages.title: Registry Client
pages.purpose: OCI Distribution Specification implementation for pulling and pushing images

pages.title: Registry Authentication
pages.purpose: Token-based authentication, user management, and permission system for registries

pages.title: Orchestration
pages.purpose: Docker Swarm and Compose compatibility for multi-container applications

pages.title: Docker Swarm Compatibility
pages.purpose: Swarm cluster management, services, tasks, and node orchestration

pages.title: Configuration Management
pages.purpose: Swarm config objects for non-sensitive configuration distribution

pages.purpose: WebAssembly components for browser-based container tooling

pages.purpose: Overview of WASM modules and their integration with JavaScript environments

pages.title: WASM Image Builder
pages.purpose: Browser-based image building with virtual filesystem and progress callbacks

pages.title: Local Container Manager
pages.purpose: In-memory container simulation for offline development with localStorage persistence

pages.title: WASM Language Server
pages.purpose: Browser-compatible LSP implementation for Runefile editing

pages.title: Developer Tools
pages.purpose: Language support and development tooling for Runefiles

pages.title: Language Server Protocol
pages.purpose: Native LSP implementation with document management and feature providers

pages.title: Code Completion
pages.purpose: Context-aware completion for instructions, arguments, and stage names

pages.title: Hover Documentation
pages.purpose: Inline documentation and type information for Runefile elements
